'''Middle-earth: The Dragons''' (METD), released in [[1996]], was the first expansion set for ''[[Middle-earth: The Wizards]]'', the first basic set of [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game|MECCG]]. As the name implies, it deals mostly with [[Dragons]], their treasure and the northern regions of Middle-earth.

*'''Number of individual cards:''' 180

METD was sold in booster packs of 15 cards (36 boosters per display), featuring 1 rare, 4 uncommons and 10 commons per booster pack.
